alert.note: Alert for Barbour; Boone; Braxton; Calhoun; Clay; Doddridge; Gilmer; Harrison; Kanawha; Lewis; Lincoln; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Nicholas; Ritchie; Roane; Taylor; Upshur (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 4:19PM EST by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A line of gusty showers will impact portions of Calhoun, Kanawha, central Upshur, east central Lincoln, southern Roane, Barbour, Harrison, southeastern Ritchie, southern Doddridge, central Nicholas, Taylor, Gilmer, Lewis, Braxton, Clay, northwestern Fayette and northeastern Boone Counties through 500 PM EST... At 417 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong showers along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Lumberport to 7 miles southeast of Alum Creek. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Charleston, Clarksburg, Buckhannon, Grafton, Weston, Philippi, Glenville, Sutton, Grantsville, Clay, Audra State Park, South Charleston, Bridgeport, Dunbar, Shinnston, Stonewood, Montgomery, Nutter Fort, Salem and Chesapeake. This includes the following highways... Interstate 79 between mile markers 1 and 128. Interstate 77 in West Virginia between mile markers 96 and 108. Interstate 64 in West Virginia between mile markers 54 and 57. West Virginia Turnpike between mile markers 71 and 95. Route 119 between mile markers 58 and 80. Route 50 in West Virginia between mile markers 58 and 82. Route 19 between mile markers 46 and 68. Route 33 between mile markers 1 and 17. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building until the strong winds pass.

area.areaDesc: Barbour; Boone; Braxton; Calhoun; Clay; Doddridge; Gilmer; Harrison; Kanawha; Lewis; Lincoln; Northwest Fayette; Northwest Nicholas; Ritchie; Roane; Taylor; Upshur
